DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether exhaled nitric oxide level affect allergen immunotherapy ( `` allergy shot '' ) . The investigator ' hypothesis successful allergen immunotherapy may accompany decrease exhaled nitric oxide level .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Allergen Immunotherapy Exhaled Nitric Oxide Adult Patients With Asthma Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: Subjects 18 year old allergic asthma and/or allergic rhinitis begin allergen desensitization Smokers Subjects dimished capacity
